sndlib.core.io
Class SNDlibIOConverter

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.io.SNDlibIOConverter

public class SNDlibIOConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Converts network, model and solution files written in one IO-format into any other IO-format.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
SNDlibIOFormat

convertNetwork

public static void convertNetwork(java.io.Reader source,
                                  java.lang.String sourceFormat,
                                  java.io.Writer target,
                                  java.lang.String targetFormat)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  SNDlibIOException
Reads a network written in the specified format from the given source and writes it to the given target using the specified target format.

Parameters:
source - the network source
sourceFormat - the network's source format
target - the target to which the network is written
targetFormat - the network's target format
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an IO error occured
SNDlibIOException - if an error concerning the IO-format occured
